fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Cambre provides tailored client representation to a broad range of international corporate and trade association organizations operating in Brussels, Europe and beyond. Optimizing our niche-position among Brussels-based public policy and public relations consultancies, we drive cross-spectrum results for clients in the areas of energy, environment and climate change, external relations and international trade, financial services, food, drink and agriculture, health and wellbeing, technology and telecoms, manufacturing industries, internal market and retail, and transport and security. In addition, we are proud to contribute to the cause of European NGOs and Non-Profit organizations, also as part of our own sustainability initiatives.

goals__remit: Cambre is an award winning Brussels-based public policy and public relations consultancy. We provide issues management, crisis support, media relations, lobbying, association management and the full range of on-line and physical communications tools. Our hallmark is practical action based on analysis, strategic advice and creativity.
